Games of 2017

Welcome to my journal of the best games I have played in 2017. They may not have all been released in 2017 but if I played it and liked it, it goes on the list.

Dec 19, 2017

Wolfenstein II The New Colossus

  • The story is batshit crazy, in the best possible way.
  • I won’t spoil it but my god, Machine Games goes to some crazy places that you never will see coming.
  • Yet every character is superbly written and well rounded.
  • The human drama element, is better than most of games....

    Read More

Nov 5, 2017

Splatoon 2

Looking back, the idea that Nintendo couldn’t make an amazing shooter seems absurd. They’ve managed to conquer every other genre, so why would a competitive shooter be the one Nintendo would disappoint on.
